section.title: Obtaining Source Code
section.para:
This &suse; product includes materials licensed to &suse; under the GNU General Public License (GPL). The GPL requires &suse; to provide the source code that corresponds to the GPL-licensed material.
The source code is available for download at on MediumÂ 2. For up to three years after distribution of the &suse; product, upon request, &suse; will mail a copy of the source code. Send requests by e-mail to . &suse; may charge a reasonable fee to recover distribution costs.
